name: Ancient Circlet
description: A crown worn by an ancient sorcerer who wielded a forbidden magic now lost to time.
locations: Sold by Mountebank at The Black Cat in Gran Soren for 111,900 G.

name: Apollo Mask
description: A mask named for a hero from beyond the rift. Wearing it bestows the user with holy protection.
locations: A Random reward to players upon slaying the online Ur-Dragon .

name: Archwizard's Helm
description: A hat lined with a material that can repel magick. Quite difficult to craft, as evidence by its high value.
locations: Caxton in Caxton's Armory in Gran Soren for  148,600 G (Post-Game)
Mathias at The Greatwall Encampment for 148,600 G
Jayce in Devilfire Grove for 148,600 G (Post-Game)

description: A mask black as pitch that you might see worn by trained cutthroats - should you see them at all.
locations: Bandit's Den in Pastona Cavern
Bluemoon Tower

description: A red hood woven from magickal fibers, favored by seasoned sorcerers.

Chamber of Tragedy

description: A mask favored by bandits and miscreants who would keep their identities hidden.

description: A mask named for a hero from beyond the rift. Wearing it bestows the user with holy protection.

name: Black Eyeglasses

name: Chain Coif

name: Chaos Helm
description: A crown worn by an ancient sorcerer who wielded a forbidden magic now lost to time.

Chamber of Sorrow

name: Cyclops Veil
description: A bronze helm wrought in the visage of a cyclops. Built to withstand frontal assaults.

name: Diadem
description: A metallic crown festooned with curving spikes, the symbol of a lord from beyond the rift.
locations: Can be purchased from Joye

name: Direwolf Veil
description: A fetching hood fashioned from the pelt of a majestic direwolf.
locations: Can be bought at the Rest Camp sold by Jayce

name: Dragon Band
description: An iron band that protects the front of the head. According to lore, it possesses the wisdom of the dragon.
locations: Reward for the quest The Heart's Compass

description: A helmet modeled after a wyrm in flight. Said to have been standard equipment for the dragon knights of old.
locations: Random reward for slaying the online Ur-Dragon .

name: Dragonroar
description: A mask named for a hero from beyond the rift. Wearing it bestows the user with holy protection.
locations: Can be found in chests in the Everfall during Post-Game.

name: Dragonseye Band
description: An eyepatch modeled after a one-eyed dragon of legend. It is said that wearing such patches was common at ceremonies meant to appease the beast's wrath.
locations: Purchase the Armor Pack: Motley Crew DLC

name: Dragonspulse Circlet
description: A crown worn of the queen of a long-fallen land, carved from the heart of a dragon. Even today, a pulse echoes from within.

name: Emissary Hood
description: A hood worn by the duke's elite personal guard.
locations: Purchased the Armor Pack: Divine Protection

name: Faerie Hood
description: A hood popular among magick practitioners. Simple of make, but good enough for the job.

name: Farewell Hood
description: A cloth hood that offers full coverage. Its goose-down lining serves well on cold nights and winter travels.
locations: Sold by Iola

name: Feather Hood
description: A cloth hood that offers full coverage. Its goose-down lining serves well on cold nights and winter travels.
locations: Sold by Caxton .

name: Gold Eyeglasses
description: A simple pair of gold eyeglasses.

locations: Sold by Delec in the Chamber of Estrangement .

name: Gossips's Mask
description: A mask painted with the frightening image of open jaws. meant to strike fear into one's foes.
locations: Find in chests in Abandoned Campsite and Witchwood

name: Grisly Skull
description: A menacing helm crafted from the skull of a creature from beyond the rift. Far more durable than ordinary bone.

name: Gryphic Helm
description: A silver great helm wrought in the form of the noble Griffin.

name: Darkened Gloves
description: Leather gloves hardened with a strong
locations: Can be purchased from Caxton , Mathias , Alon .

description: The clothing of a fairly well-heeled lady. Meant for women, though men without shame might also wear it.

name: Set of Royal Guard Armor
locations: N/A
